webuiResourcesobject

webui.t[1094]

Superclass
Tree

Summary

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

The resource handler for our standard library resources. All of the library resources are in the /webuires resource folder. This exposes everything in that folder as a downloadable Web object.

webuiResources :   WebResourceResFile
